mapper.select: select NVL(X.cnt, 0) as subsCount, D.mt as month from ( select TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - (interval '1' month) * (level - 1), 'YY/MM') as mt from dual connect by level <= 6 ) D LEFT JOIN ( select count(I.idx) cnt, to_char(O.odate, 'YY/MM') as odate from oitem I inner join orders O on I.orders_idx = O.idx where O.odate between TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - (interval '5' month), 'YY/MM'), 'YY/MM') and SYSDATE and I.category = '정기구독' group by to_CHAR(O.odate, 'YY/MM') ) X ON D.mt = X.odate order by D.mt
